page.title: 08FOXTON SCHOOL
page.content: Foxton County Primary School is on the edge of Foxton village toward Gartree prison.It serves the villages of Foxton,Gumley,Laughton and Mowsley along with the children of the staff of Gartree Prison. It caters for children aged 5 to 11yrs..It is a modern purpose built semi_open plan building.There is a staff of 3 including a Head teacher.Staff are also assisted by parent volunteers who take the children for lessons such as games. School meals are prepared by a catering staff and those children not taking school dinners can either go home for dinner or eat packed lunches in the dining hall.
